1.content: So, whose feet strike your fancy?
1.title: Beginning

choices: Inu then pins him, and places both his feet on the struggling ninjas face, RUB
11.content:
InuYasha walked barefoot towards the forest, he held in his arms, a an unconsuous stranger.
When he got to the forest, he lay the stranger down on it's back, the stranger woke up instantly and tried to get up, but was grabbed by both arms from behind by inuyasha. Inu then jumped and wrapped his legs around his opponent's waist, then holding his arms by the wrists, he tucked them under his thighs so he didn't have to use his hands to stop his apponent from moving at all, "this is kinda fun!" he said mockingly, and used his hands to unmask the ninja he had found lerking through the village, "I've got alot of hours to spare with you so..." he said, the exitment grew on his face, as he sat there relaxed while his opponent kicked and struggled. "I'm comfertable" said Inu, he insurted two index fingers in the ninja's mouth and pulled at his cheeks then laughed as the ninja kicked as hard as he can, mumbling for him to stop, but inu continued and wasn't planning on stopping the humiliation any time soon, infact he had days to spare, he made the ninja do funny faces using his hands, pulling at his cheeks. Inu then put his legs up and held the sides of the ninjas face with his feet, rubbing and rubbing, at the same time laughing hard and enjoying himself while the ninja felt the exact opposite!
11.title: InuYasha

choices: He let's him breath, but only the smell of his feet
111.content:
Inuyasha let go of the ninja but then jumped and wrestled it and within seconds he was holding it's hands and sitting directly on it's chest smiling and then said mockingly "you lost another wrestle, hmm where can I start your six hour humiliation?" the ninja tried to shout but held himself instantly as he belt something.
"I wouldn't do that if I were u" said Inu as he rubbed his bare foot between the ninjas legs, warning him, then said "think of it this way, your not going anywhere, I've got days to play around with you and guess what, your gonna smell my feet!!" the ninja tried to scream but felt inu's feet go directly on the ninjas face, he rubbed every inch of it's face, "smell my feet go on" the ninja struggled and looked the other diresction, "fine, if u don't wanna breath then il help you do that!" and with the big and second toes of his right foot Inu squeezed the ninjas nose shut so he couldn't breath, and had his other foot on the ninjas crouch to ensure he won't scream and kept rubbing it so the ninja wouldn't forget. The ninja tried to breathe but suddenly Inu stuffed his unbelievably sweaty training socks in the ninjas mouth and taped it shut leaving the ninja unable to breathe. After a minuite, the ninja kicked franticly for air, which inuyasha's toes blocked.
111.title: Inu then pins him, and places both his feet on ...

choices: You find him on an old path.
You find him in a village.
13.content: OK. Shippou it is. But under what conditions?
13.title: Shippou

choices: In the tall grass. Near a village.
131.content: OK. So you shrink/are shrunk. But where?
131.title: You shrink, and find Shippou.

choices: On the bed. Next to him.
1312.content: OK. You are shrunk, and in a room. But where in the room are you?
1312.title: In a room...somewhere.

choices: You remember that you snuck in here a while back.
13121.content: You wake up from the nap you took, and when you come to, you see that it is way too dark than normal. Just then...
13121.title: In a backpack. {Kagome's backpack.}

choices: Dig the stuff out. And you.
131212.content:
Just then, you hear a voice.


"Hmm. I wonder where Kogome hid her ninja food this time?" You hear a small voice like that of a child coming from outside whatever it was you were inside of. Just then, You feel the thing you're in start to move.


"Ah-ha. So that's where she hid it." As you're being thrown around like a rag-doll, you see the things you bump into. A pair of shoes. Some socks. Some food. A bowl. A lollypop. A candy bar. And after what seemed like forever in there, the inside of the backpack opens up. And when you look up, you see the face of a boy...only he looks more like a demon then anything else.


"Hmm. It has to be in here somewhere." The boy then starts to...
131212.title: You hear a voice.

1312122.content: "Hmm. I think I'll get in the backpack and take a look around." As he said this, His feet start kicking. and one of them knocks you into...
1312122.title: Climb into the backpack.

choices: He doesn't see it, but he walks on it.
131212221.content:
The boy's foot knocks you into two peaces of bread. As you try to get back up, you slip on something slippery and fall face-first into what tastes like butter. You also smell cheese on top of you, as well as some veggies. All this on top of you, and the butter underneath, prevent you from moving.


"Hmm. It has to be here somewhere." You hear the boy's voice coming closer, until...
131212221.title: A sandwitch.

1312122212.content:
As the boy's voice nears you, you start to feel some wight being put on top of you. The boy's paw-like foot comes down on top of the sandwitch as he looks for food.


"Come on food, where are you?" The boy is now standing right on top of the sandwitch. And you. As the boy moves around, his feet claw into the sandwitch, making it so that every time he moves, it moves. And every time it moves, you end up getting tossed all over. The butter is so slick, that you are now covered in butter all over. And at one point, his foot ends up going right through the sandwitch, almost hitting you. His foot is so close to you now, that when he moved again, you slid right on top of his foot and...
1312122212.title: He doesn't see it, but he walks on it.

15.content: Here's some more for ya.
15.title: Other

151.content: "OK. How do you meet him?"
151.title: Kohaku.

1511.content: "OK. Where do you find him?"
1511.title: You're shrunk, and find him.

choices: You've been shrunk, and snuck in here to rest.
15111.content: "Ohh. What happened?" You say to yourself as you wake up. When you got up, you took a look around and saw a giant boy on a giant bed, that you were on. That's when you realize...
15111.title: In his room, sleeping.

151111.content: You just remembered, you've been like this for as long as you can remember, and you came in here so you could rest on something more relaxing than the ground. So this boy must be the one who lives here, came in for a nap, and didn't even see you when he got into bed. You took a good look at the boy and you guess that he must be about 12 or so years old. He's wearing what looks like a demon slayers uniform, and he's barefoot. Seeing as this is you're first time this close to someone this big, you decide to explore his body. But where do you start?
151111.title: You've been shrunk, and snuck in here to rest.

1511111.content: As you get close to his feet, you start to see that his feet are very cute looking. His feet look very well kept. His toes look so round, the ball of his foot looks soft, and the rest of his feet look very clean, like he just got out of the bath. His feet are even wet looking to prove it. With this boy's feet all to yourself, what do you do first?
1511111.title: His feet.

choices: The boy knocks you off the bed.
15111111.content: Making sure that the boy is sound asleep, you take a big lick of his foot. This makes his foot move a little and knocks you over. You get back up to see that he's still asleep, and go back to licking his feet again. This time however, you grab the sides of his feet and then lick them. His feet move again, but this time you don't get knocked over. You lick his feet some more until his feet stop moving. You take this as as that sign that he won't move them again, and continue licking them. But then...
15111111.title: Lick them.

151111112.content: The boy's foot moves again, but this time it moves so hard that it knocks you off the bed and into...
151111112.title: The boy knocks you off the bed.

1511112.content: "Where else could you look?"
1511112.title: Other.

info.description: This is an InuYasha Foot Worship story. Male characters only. Sex and any other assorted fetishes are allowed, just have fun and don't be shy.
